doc:
Christine Auten https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christine_Auten 0 Christine McPeters Auten (born May 7, 1969 in Huntsville, Alabama) is an American voice actress, ADR director, and ADR scriptwriter who works for Funimation, ADV Films and Sentai Filmworks. She is currently a producer for SXSW Interactive.Auten performs the voice of Esdeath, the main antagonist from the popular anime Akame ga Kill, Mesousa from Pani Poni Dash, Kurenai from Samurai Gun, Yufan Xia from Full Metal Panic: The Second Raid, Priscilla Asagiri from Bubblegum Crisis Tokyo 2040, and Sakaki from Azumanga Daioh. Christine_McPeters_Auten ( born May_7_,_1969 in Huntsville , Alabama ) is an_American_voice_actress , ADR_director , and ADR_scriptwriter who works for Funimation , ADV_Films_and_Sentai_Filmworks . She is currently a_producer for SXSW_Interactive.Auten performs the_voice of Esdeath , the_main_antagonist from the_popular_anime_Akame_ga Kill , Mesousa from Pani_Poni_Dash , Kurenai from Samurai_Gun , Yufan_Xia from Full_Metal_Panic : The_Second_Raid , Priscilla_Asagiri from Bubblegum_Crisis_Tokyo_2040 , and Sakaki from Azumanga_Daioh .
